page.title: 09Markets in Hungerford.
page.content: Two weekly markets are held in Hungerford. The Tuesday market is held at the Football Club and has about 10 stalls.It runs from late afternoon through until late evening. It sells a variety of goods including clothes,veg,shoes and watches.The Wednesday market held in the High Street, is larger having about 20 stalls offering a wide range of goods such as shoes, clothes,stationary and toys many being supplied from all over the world.The stallholders go regularly to other markets in an area within a radius of about 40km from Hungerford.At least one stallholder rises at 4am to arrive on time but he will get about 300 customers.The stallholders are regulars and keep to their own spot each week.In addition a small auction takes place every Friday.
